segments.pli: “Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato puriso ekantaamanāpo hoti mātugāmassa.
segments.en: “Mendicants, when a man has five factors he is extremely undesirable to a female.

segments.pli: Na ca rūpavā hoti, na ca bhogavā hoti, na ca sīlavā hoti, alaso ca hoti, pajañcassa na labhati—
segments.en: He’s not attractive, wealthy, or ethical; he’s idle, and he doesn’t beget children.

segments.pli: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato puriso ekantaamanāpo hoti mātugāmassa.
segments.en: When a man has these five factors he is extremely undesirable to a female.

segments.pli: Pañcahi, bhikkhave, aṅgehi samannāgato puriso ekantamanāpo hoti mātugāmassa.
segments.en: When a man has five factors he is extremely desirable to a female.

segments.pli: Rūpavā ca hoti, bhogavā ca hoti, sīlavā ca hoti, dakkho ca hoti analaso, pajañcassa labhati—
segments.en: He’s attractive, wealthy, and ethical; he’s skillful and tireless, and he begets children.

segments.pli: imehi kho, bhikkhave, pañcahi aṅgehi samannāgato puriso ekantamanāpo hoti mātugāmassā”ti.
segments.en: When a man has these five factors he is extremely desirable to a female.”
